verses.verse: Who is like the wise<WH2450> man?<WH3045> And who knows the interpretation<WH6592> of a thing?<WH1697> A man<WH120>'s wisdom<WH2451> makes his face<WH6440> shine,<WH215> and the hardness<WH5797> of his face<WH6440> is changed.<WH8132>
I say,<WH8104> "Keep the king<WH4428>'s command!<WH6310>" because<WH1700> of the oath<WH7621> to God.<WH430>
Don't<WH926> be hasty to go out<WH3212> of his presence.<WH6440> Don't<WH5975> persist in an evil<WH7451> thing,<WH1697> for he does<WH6213> whatever pleases him,<WH2654>
for the king<WH4428>'s word<WH1697> is supreme.<WH7983> Who can say<WH559> to him,<WH6213> "What are you doing?"
Whoever keeps<WH8104> the commandment<WH4687> shall not come<WH3045> to<WH1697> harm,<WH7451> and his<WH2450> wise heart<WH3820> will know<WH3045> the time<WH6256> and procedure.<WH4941>
For there is<WH3426> a time<WH6256> and procedure<WH4941> for every purpose,<WH2656> although the misery<WH7451> of man<WH120> is heavy on him.<WH7227>
For he doesn't<WH3045> know that which will be;<WH5046> for who can tell him how it will be?

There is no man<WH120> who has power<WH7989> over the spirit<WH7307> to contain<WH3607> the spirit;<WH7307> neither does he have power<WH7983> over the day<WH3117> of death.<WH4194> There is no discharge<WH4917> in war;<WH4421> neither shall wickedness<WH7562> deliver<WH4422> those who practice it.<WH1167>

All this have I seen,<WH7200> and applied<WH5414> my mind<WH3820> to every work<WH4639> that is done<WH6213> under the sun.<WH8121> There is a time<WH6256> in which one man<WH120> has power<WH7980> over another to his hurt.<WH7451>

So<WH3651> I saw<WH7200> the wicked<WH7563> buried.<WH6912> Indeed they came<WH935> also<WH1980> from holiness.<WH4725> They went<WH935> and were forgotten<WH7911> in the city<WH5892> where they did<WH6213> this.<WH1892> This also is vanity.

Because sentence<WH6599> against an evil<WH7451> work<WH4639> is not executed<WH6213> speedily,<WH4120> therefore the heart<WH3820> of the sons<WH1121> of men<WH120> is fully set<WH4390> in them to do<WH6213> evil.<WH7451>

Though a sinner<WH2398> commits<WH6213> crimes<WH7451> a hundred times,<WH3967> and lives long,<WH748> yet surely I know<WH3045> that it will be better<WH2896> with those who fear<WH3373> God,<WH430> who are reverent<WH3372> before him.<WH6440>
But it shall not be well<WH2896> with the wicked,<WH7563> neither shall he lengthen<WH748> days<WH3117> like a shadow;<WH6738> because he doesn't<WH6440> fear<WH3373> God.<WH430>

There is<WH3426> a vanity<WH1892> which is done<WH6213> on the earth,<WH776> that there are righteous<WH6662> men to whom it happens<WH5060> according to the work<WH4639> of the wicked.<WH7563> Again,<WH3426> there are wicked<WH7563> men to whom it happens<WH5060> according to the work<WH4639> of the righteous.<WH6662> I said<WH559> that this also<WH1571> is vanity.<WH1892>

Then I commended<WH7623> mirth,<WH8057> because a man<WH120> has no better thing<WH2896> under the sun,<WH8121> than to eat,<WH398> and to drink,<WH8354> and to be joyful:<WH8055> for that will accompany<WH3867> him in his labor<WH5999> all the days<WH3117> of his life<WH2416> which God<WH430> has given<WH5414> him under the sun.<WH8121>

When I applied<WH5414> my heart<WH3820> to know<WH3045> wisdom,<WH2451> and to see<WH7200> the business<WH6045> that is done<WH6213> on the earth<WH776> (for also there is that neither day<WH3117> nor night<WH3915> sees<WH7200> sleep<WH8142> with his eyes<WH5869>),

then I saw<WH7200> all the work<WH4639> of God,<WH430> that man<WH120> can't<WH3201> find out<WH4672> the work<WH4639> that is done<WH6213> under the sun,<WH8121> because<WH834> however<WH7945> much a man<WH120> labors<WH5998> to seek it out,<WH1245> yet he won't<WH4672> find it.<WH2450> Yes even though a wise man thinks<WH559> he can comprehend<WH3045> it,<WH3201> he won't be able to find it.<WH4672>
